comments.body:
Can you add some retries to this? I've run it a few times and gotten 
```
The full traceback is:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/tmp/ansible_gfbyo1jp/ansible_module_ec2_vpc_net.py", line 467, in main
    connection.delete_vpc(VpcId=vpc_id)
  File "/tmp/ansible_gfbyo1jp/ansible_modlib.zip/ansible/module_utils/aws/core.py", line 241, in deciding_wrapper
    return unwrapped(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/shertel/Workspace/ansible/venv/python3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages/botocore/client.py", line 314, in _api_call
    return self._make_api_call(operation_name, kwargs)
  File "/Users/shertel/Workspace/ansible/venv/python3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages/botocore/client.py", line 612, in _make_api_call
    raise error_class(parsed_response, operation_name)
botocore.exceptions.ClientError: An error occurred (DependencyViolation) when calling the DeleteVpc operation: The vpc 'vpc-18020e61' has dependencies and cannot be deleted.
```
and had to wait and then delete the VPC myself.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +174,178 @@      ignore_errors: yes

    - name: remove setup VPC
      ec2_vpc_net:
        cidr_block: 10.0.0.0/16
